DAWN.firstNightReminder: Wait approximately 10 seconds. Call for eyes open, then immediately announce which players (if any) died.
DAWN.name: Dawn
DAWN.otherNightReminder: Wait approximately 10 seconds. Call for eyes open, then immediately announce which players (if any) died.

DEMON.firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: wake up the Demon. Show the 'These are your minions' card. Point to each Minion. Show the 'These characters are not in play' card. Show 3 character tokens of Good characters that are not in play
DEMON.name: Demon Info

DUSK.firstNightReminder: Check that all eyes are closed. Some travellers act.
DUSK.name: Dusk
DUSK.otherNightReminder: Check that all eyes are closed. Some travellers act.

MINION.firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: wake up all of the Minions. They make eye contact with each other. Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Point to the Demon.
MINION.name: Minion Info

acrobat.ability: Each night*, if either good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, you die.
acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.otherNightReminder: If a good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, the Acrobat player dies.

alchemist.ability: You have a not-in-play Minion ability.
alchemist.firstNightReminder: Show the Alchemist a not-in-play Minion token
alchemist.name: Alchemist

alhadikhia.ability: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
alhadikhia.name: Al-Hadikhia
alhadikhia.otherNightReminder: The Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 players. Announce the first player, wake them to nod yes to live or shake head no to die, kill or resurrect accordingly, then put to sleep and announce the next player. If all 3 are alive after this, all 3 die.

alsaahir.ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.
alsaahir.name: Alsaahir

amnesiac.ability: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
amnesiac.firstNightReminder: Decide the Amnesiac's entire ability. If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
amnesiac.name: Amnesiac
amnesiac.otherNightReminder: If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.

angel.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.
angel.name: Angel

apprentice.ability: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).
apprentice.firstNightReminder: Show the Apprentice the 'You are' card, then a Townsfolk or Minion token. In the Grimoire, replace the Apprentice token with that character token, and put the Apprentice's 'Is the Apprentice' reminder by that character token.
apprentice.name: Apprentice

artist.ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.
artist.name: Artist

assassin.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.
assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.otherNightReminder: If the Assassin has not yet used their ability: The Assassin either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player dies.

atheist.ability: The Storyteller can break the game rules & if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]
atheist.name: Atheist

balloonist.ability: Each night, you learn 1 player of each character type, until there are no more types to learn. [+1 Outsider]
balloonist.firstNightReminder: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
balloonist.name: Balloonist
balloonist.otherNightReminder: Choose a character type that does not yet have a Seen reminder next to a character of that type. Point to a player whose character is of that type, if there are any. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.

banshee.ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.
banshee.name: Banshee
banshee.otherNightReminder: Announce that the Banshee has died.

barber.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
barber.name: Barber
barber.otherNightReminder: If the Barber died today: Wake the Demon. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players. If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show 'You are', then their new character token.

barista.ability: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy and gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.
barista.firstNightReminder: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
barista.name: Barista
barista.otherNightReminder: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).

baron.ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]
baron.name: Baron

beggar.ability: You must use a vote token to vote. Dead players may choose to give you theirs. If so, you learn their alignment. You are sober & healthy.
beggar.name: Beggar

bishop.ability: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposite player must be nominated each day.
bishop.name: Bishop

boffin.ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character’s ability.  You both now which.
boffin.firstNightReminder: Wake the Boffin and how them the token of the ability the Demon has. Put the Boffin back to sleep. Wake the Demon, show the Boffin token, then show the token of the good ability the Demon has.
boffin.name: Boffin

bonecollector.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.
bonecollector.name: Bone Collector
bonecollector.otherNightReminder: The Bone Collector either shakes their head no or points at any dead player. If they pointed at any dead player, put the Bone Collector's 'Has Ability' reminder by the chosen player's character token. (They may need to be woken tonight to use it.)

boomdandy.ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.
boomdandy.name: Boomdandy

bootlegger.ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
bootlegger.firstNightReminder: Announce the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
bootlegger.name: Bootlegger

bountyhunter.ability: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
bountyhunter.firstNightReminder: Point to 1 evil player. Wake the townsfolk who is evil and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
bountyhunter.name: Bounty Hunter
bountyhunter.otherNightReminder: If the known evil player has died, point to another evil player.

buddhist.ability: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.
buddhist.name: Buddhist

bureaucrat.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.
bureaucrat.firstNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
bureaucrat.name: Bureaucrat
bureaucrat.otherNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

butcher.ability: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.
butcher.name: Butcher

butler.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
butler.firstNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
butler.name: Butler
butler.otherNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.

cannibal.ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
cannibal.name: Cannibal

cerenovus.ability: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are “mad” they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.
cerenovus.firstNightReminder: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
cerenovus.name: Cerenovus
cerenovus.otherNightReminder: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.

chambermaid.ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
chambermaid.firstNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
chambermaid.name: Chambermaid
chambermaid.otherNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.

chef.ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
chef.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.
chef.name: Chef

choirboy.ability: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+ the King]
choirboy.name: Choirboy
choirboy.otherNightReminder: If the King was killed by the Demon, wake the Choirboy and point to the Demon player.

clockmaker.ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
clockmaker.firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (1, 2, 3, etc.) of places from Demon to closest Minion.
clockmaker.name: Clockmaker

courtier.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.
courtier.firstNightReminder: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
courtier.name: Courtier
courtier.otherNightReminder: Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is poisoned. If the Courtier has not yet used their ability: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.

cultleader.ability: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbour. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.
cultleader.firstNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
cultleader.name: Cult Leader
cultleader.otherNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.

damsel.ability: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
damsel.firstNightReminder: Wake all the Minions, show them the 'This character selected you' card and the Damsel token.
damsel.name: Damsel
damsel.otherNightReminder: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show 'You are' card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

deviant.ability: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.
deviant.name: Deviant

devilsadvocate.ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
devilsadvocate.firstNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
devilsadvocate.name: Devil's Advocate
devilsadvocate.otherNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.

djinn.ability: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.
djinn.name: Djinn

doomsayer.ability: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.
doomsayer.name: Doomsayer

dreamer.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
dreamer.firstNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.otherNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.

drunk.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.
drunk.name: Drunk

duchess.ability: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.
duchess.name: Duchess
duchess.otherNightReminder: Wake each player marked “Visitor” or “False Info” one at a time. Show them the Duchess token, then fingers (1, 2, 3) equaling the number of evil players marked “Visitor” or, if you are waking the player marked “False Info,” show them any number of fingers except the number of evil players marked “Visitor.”

empath.ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.
empath.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.
empath.name: Empath
empath.otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil neighbours.

engineer.ability: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.
engineer.firstNightReminder: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the You are card and the relevant character tokens.
engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.otherNightReminder: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character tokens.

eviltwin.ability: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.
eviltwin.firstNightReminder: Wake the Evil Twin and their twin. Confirm that they have acknowledged each other. Point to the Evil Twin. Show their Evil Twin token to the twin player. Point to the twin. Show their character token to the Evil Twin player.
eviltwin.name: Evil Twin

exorcist.ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
exorcist.name: Exorcist
exorcist.otherNightReminder: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon. Show the Exorcist token. Point to the Exorcist. The Demon does not act tonight.

fanggu.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
fanggu.name: Fang Gu
fanggu.otherNightReminder: The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was an Outsider and there are no other Fang Gu in play: The Fang Gu dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Fang Gu. Wake the new Fang Gu. Show the 'You are' card, then the Fang Gu token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.

farmer.ability: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.
farmer.name: Farmer
farmer.otherNightReminder: If a Farmer died tonight, choose another good player and make them the Farmer. Wake this player, show them the 'You are' card and the Farmer character token.

fearmonger.ability: Each night, choose a player. If you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.
fearmonger.firstNightReminder: The Fearmonger points to a player. Place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.
fearmonger.name: Fearmonger
fearmonger.otherNightReminder: The Fearmonger points to a player. If different from the previous night, place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.

fibbin.ability: Once per game, 1 good player might get false information.
fibbin.name: Fibbin

fiddler.ability: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.
fiddler.name: Fiddler

fisherman.ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help you win.
fisherman.name: Fisherman

flowergirl.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.
flowergirl.name: Flowergirl
flowergirl.otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether the Demon voted today. Place the 'Demon not voted' marker (remove 'Demon voted', if any).

fool.ability: The first time you die, you don't.
fool.name: Fool

fortuneteller.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.
fortuneteller.firstNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Demon.
fortuneteller.name: Fortune Teller
fortuneteller.otherNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.

gambler.ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.
gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.otherNightReminder: The Gambler points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.

gangster.ability: Once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbour, if your other alive neighbour agrees.
gangster.name: Gangster

general.ability: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.
general.firstNightReminder: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.
general.name: General
general.otherNightReminder: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.

goblin.ability: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.
goblin.name: Goblin

godfather.ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [−1 or +1 Outsider]
godfather.firstNightReminder: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.
godfather.name: Godfather
godfather.otherNightReminder: If an Outsider died today: The Godfather points to a player. That player dies.

golem.ability: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.
golem.name: Golem

goon.ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.
goon.name: Goon

gossip.ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
gossip.name: Gossip
gossip.otherNightReminder: If the Gossip’s public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.

grandmother.ability: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.
grandmother.firstNightReminder: Show the marked character token. Point to the marked player.
grandmother.name: Grandmother
grandmother.otherNightReminder: If the Grandmother’s grandchild was killed by the Demon tonight: The Grandmother dies.

gunslinger.ability: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.
gunslinger.name: Gunslinger

harlot.ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.
harlot.name: Harlot
harlot.otherNightReminder: The Harlot points at any player. Then, put the Harlot to sleep. Wake the chosen player, show them the 'This character selected you' token, then the Harlot token. That player either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nodded their head yes, wake the Harlot and show them the chosen player's character token. Then, you may decide that both players die.

harpy.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or both might die.
harpy.firstNightReminder: Wake the Harpy; they point at one player, then another. Wake the 1st player the Harpy pointed to, show them the 'This character has selected you' card, show them the Harpy token, then point at the 2nd player the Harpy pointed to.
harpy.name: Harpy
harpy.otherNightReminder: Wake the Harpy; they point at one player, then another. Wake the 1st player the Harpy pointed to, show them the 'This character has selected you' card, show them the Harpy token, then point at the 2nd player the Harpy pointed to.

hatter.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.
hatter.name: Hatter
hatter.otherNightReminder: If the Hatter died today: Wake the Minions and Demon. Show them the 'This Character Selected You' info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character.  If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Change each player to the character they chose.

hellslibrarian.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.
hellslibrarian.name: Hell's Librarian

heretic.ability: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.
heretic.name: Heretic

highpriestess.ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.
highpriestess.name: High Priestess

huntsman.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]
huntsman.firstNightReminder: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.
huntsman.name: Huntsman
huntsman.otherNightReminder: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.

imp.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
imp.name: Imp
imp.otherNightReminder: The Imp points to a player. That player dies. If the Imp chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Imp token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Imp token.

innkeeper.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.
innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
innkeeper.otherNightReminder: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.

investigator.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
investigator.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
investigator.name: Investigator

judge.ability: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.
judge.name: Judge

juggler.ability: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.
juggler.name: Juggler
juggler.otherNightReminder: If today was the Juggler’s first day: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of 'Correct' markers. Remove markers.

kazali.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]
kazali.firstNightReminder: The Kazali points at a player and a Minion on the character sheet. Replace their old character token with the Minion token, show them the “You Are” info token then the Minion character token, and give a thumbs down. Repeat until the normal number of Minions exist. Put the Kazali to sleep.
kazali.name: Kazali
kazali.otherNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player. That player dies.

king.ability: Each night, if the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.
king.firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon, show them the 'This character selected you' card, show the King token and point to the King player.
king.name: King
king.otherNightReminder: If there are more dead than living, show the King a character token of a living player.

klutz.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.
klutz.name: Klutz

knight.ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.
knight.firstNightReminder: Point to two players who are not the Demon.
knight.name: Knight

legion.ability: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]
legion.name: Legion
legion.otherNightReminder: Choose a player, that player dies.

leviathan.ability: If more than 1 good player is executed, you win. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.
leviathan.firstNightReminder: Place the Leviathan 'Day 1' marker. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play; this is Day 1.'
leviathan.name: Leviathan
leviathan.otherNightReminder: Change the Leviathan Day reminder for the next day.

librarian.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
librarian.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
librarian.name: Librarian

lilmonsta.ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". A player dies each night*. [+1 Minion]
lilmonsta.firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
lilmonsta.name: Lil' Monsta
lilmonsta.otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.

lleech.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing an alive player: they are poisoned - you die if & only if they die.
lleech.firstNightReminder: The Lleech points to a player. Place the Poisoned reminder token.
lleech.name: Lleech
lleech.otherNightReminder: The Lleech points to a player. That player dies.

lordoftyphon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? To +? Outsiders]
lordoftyphon.firstNightReminder: Wake the players on either side of the Demon. Show them the 'You Are' card, the token of the Minion they now are, and a thumbs down to indicate they are evil.
lordoftyphon.name: Lord of Typhon
lordoftyphon.otherNightReminder: The Lord of Typhon points to a player. That player dies.

lunatic.ability: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.
lunatic.firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: Show the Lunatic a number of arbitrary 'Minions', players equal to the number of Minions in play. Show 3 character tokens of arbitrary good characters. If the token received by the Lunatic is a Demon that would wake tonight: Allow the Lunatic to do the Demon actions. Place their 'attack' markers. Wake the Demon. Show the Demon’s real character token. Show them the Lunatic player. If the Lunatic attacked players: Show the real demon each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.
lunatic.name: Lunatic
lunatic.otherNightReminder: Allow the Lunatic to do the actions of the Demon. Place their 'attack' markers. If the Lunatic selected players: Wake the Demon. Show the 'attack' marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.

lycanthrope.ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if good, they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.
lycanthrope.name: Lycanthrope
lycanthrope.otherNightReminder: The Lycanthrope points to a living player: if good, they die and no one else can die tonight.

magician.ability: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.
magician.name: Magician

marionette.ability: You think you are a good character but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbour the Demon]
marionette.firstNightReminder: Select one of the good players next to the Demon and place the Is the Marionette reminder token. Wake the Demon and show them the Marionette.
marionette.name: Marionette

mastermind.ability: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.
mastermind.name: Mastermind

mathematician.ability: Each night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.
mathematician.firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
mathematician.name: Mathematician
mathematician.otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.

matron.ability: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.
matron.name: Matron

mayor.ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
mayor.name: Mayor

mephit.ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.
mephit.firstNightReminder: Show the Mephit their secret word.
mephit.name: Mephit
mephit.otherNightReminder: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mephit's secret word and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil signal.

mezepheles.ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.
mezepheles.firstNightReminder: Show the Mezepheles their secret word.
mezepheles.name: Mezepheles
mezepheles.otherNightReminder: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mezepheles' secret word and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil signal.

minstrel.ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.
minstrel.name: Minstrel

monk.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
monk.name: Monk
monk.otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.

moonchild.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.
moonchild.name: Moonchild
moonchild.otherNightReminder: If the Moonchild used their ability to target a player today: If that player is good, they die.

mutant.ability: If you are “mad” about being an Outsider, you might be executed.
mutant.name: Mutant

nightwatchman.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.
nightwatchman.firstNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.
nightwatchman.name: Nightwatchman
nightwatchman.otherNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.

noble.ability: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.
noble.firstNightReminder: Point to 3 players including one evil player, in no particular order.
noble.name: Noble

nodashii.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.
nodashii.name: No Dashii
nodashii.otherNightReminder: The No Dashii points to a player. That player dies.

ogre.ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.
ogre.firstNightReminder: The Ogre points to a player (not themselves) and becomes their alignment.
ogre.name: Ogre

ojo.ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
ojo.name: Ojo
ojo.otherNightReminder: The Ojo points to a character on the sheet; if in play, that player dies. If it is not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies instead.

oracle.ability: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.
oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of dead evil players.

organgrinder.ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.
organgrinder.name: Organ Grinder

pacifist.ability: Executed good players might not die.
pacifist.name: Pacifist

philosopher.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.
philosopher.firstNightReminder: The Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.
philosopher.name: Philosopher
philosopher.otherNightReminder: If the Philosopher has not used their ability: the Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.

pithag.ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
pithag.name: Pit-Hag
pithag.otherNightReminder: The Pit-Hag points to a player and a character on the sheet. If this character is not in play, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character token. If the character is in play, nothing happens.

pixie.ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.
pixie.firstNightReminder: Show the Pixie 1 in-play Townsfolk character token.
pixie.name: Pixie

plaguedoctor.ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.
plaguedoctor.name: Plague Doctor

po.ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.
po.name: Po
po.otherNightReminder: If the Po chose no-one the previous night: The Po points to three players. Otherwise: The Po either shows the 'no' head signal , or points to a player. Chosen players die

poisoner.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
poisoner.firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
poisoner.name: Poisoner
poisoner.otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.

politician.ability: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.
politician.name: Politician

poppygrower.ability: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.
poppygrower.firstNightReminder: Do not inform the Demon/Minions who each other are
poppygrower.name: Poppy Grower
poppygrower.otherNightReminder: If the Poppy Grower has died, show the Minions/Demon who each other are.

preacher.ability: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
preacher.firstNightReminder: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
preacher.name: Preacher
preacher.otherNightReminder: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.

professor.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.
professor.name: Professor
professor.otherNightReminder: If the Professor has not used their ability: The Professor either shakes their head no, or points to a player. If that player is a Townsfolk, they are now alive.

psychopath.ability: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.
psychopath.name: Psychopath

pukka.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.
pukka.firstNightReminder: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned.
pukka.name: Pukka
pukka.otherNightReminder: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.

puzzlemaster.ability: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.
puzzlemaster.name: Puzzlemaster

ravenkeeper.ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
ravenkeeper.name: Ravenkeeper
ravenkeeper.otherNightReminder: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight: The Ravenkeeper points to a player. Show that player’s character token.

recluse.ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.
recluse.name: Recluse

revolutionary.ability: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, one of them registers falsely.
revolutionary.name: Revolutionary

riot.ability: Nominees die, but may nominate again immediately (on day 3, they must). After day 3, evil wins. [All Minions are Riot]
riot.name: Riot

sage.ability: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
sage.name: Sage
sage.otherNightReminder: If the Sage was killed by a Demon: Point to two players, one of which is that Demon.

sailor.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.
sailor.firstNightReminder: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.otherNightReminder: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.

saint.ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.
saint.name: Saint

savant.ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.
savant.name: Savant

scapegoat.ability: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.
scapegoat.name: Scapegoat

scarletwoman.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don’t count)
scarletwoman.name: Scarlet Woman
scarletwoman.otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.

seamstress.ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.
seamstress.firstNightReminder: The Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
seamstress.name: Seamstress
seamstress.otherNightReminder: If the Seamstress has not yet used their ability: the Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.

sentinel.ability: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.
sentinel.name: Sentinel

shabaloth.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
shabaloth.name: Shabaloth
shabaloth.otherNightReminder: One player that the Shabaloth chose the previous night might be resurrected. The Shabaloth points to two players. Those players die.

shugenja.ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.
shugenja.firstNightReminder: Wake the Shugenja; point horizontally in the direction of the closest evil player. If the two closest evil players are equidistant, point your finger horizontally in either direction.
shugenja.name: Shugenja

slayer.ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.
slayer.name: Slayer

snakecharmer.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.
snakecharmer.firstNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
snakecharmer.name: Snake Charmer
snakecharmer.otherNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.

snitch.firstNightReminder: After Minion info wake each Minion and show them three not-in-play character tokens. These may be the same or different to each other and the ones shown to the Demon.
snitch.name: Snitch

soldier.ability: You are safe from the Demon.
soldier.name: Soldier

spiritofivory.ability: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.
spiritofivory.name: Spirit of Ivory

spy.ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
spy.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
spy.name: Spy
spy.otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.

stormcatcher.ability: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.
stormcatcher.firstNightReminder: Mark a good player as "Safe". Wake each evil player and show them the marked player.
stormcatcher.name: Storm Catcher

summoner.ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]
summoner.firstNightReminder: Show the 'These characters are not in play' card. Show 3 character tokens of good characters not in play.
summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.otherNightReminder: If it is the 3rd night, wake the Summoner. They point to a player and a Demon on the character sheet - that player becomes that Demon.

sweetheart.ability: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.
sweetheart.name: Sweetheart
sweetheart.otherNightReminder: Choose a player that is drunk.

tealady.ability: If both your alive neighbours are good, they can't die.
tealady.name: Tea Lady

thief.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
thief.firstNightReminder: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
thief.name: Thief
thief.otherNightReminder: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

tinker.ability: You might die at any time.
tinker.name: Tinker

towncrier.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.
towncrier.name: Town Crier
towncrier.otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Minion nominated today. Place the 'Minion not nominated' marker (remove 'Minion nominated', if any).

toymaker.ability: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.
toymaker.name: Toymaker
toymaker.otherNightReminder: If it is a night when a Demon attack could end the game, and the Demon is marked “Final night: No Attack,” then the Demon does not act tonight. (Do not wake them.)

undertaker.ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
undertaker.name: Undertaker
undertaker.otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today: Show that player’s character token.

vigormortis.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [−1 Outsider]
vigormortis.name: Vigormortis
vigormortis.otherNightReminder: The Vigormortis points to a player. That player dies. If a Minion, they keep their ability and one of their Townsfolk neighbours is poisoned.

villageidiot.ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]
villageidiot.firstNightReminder: The Village Idiot points to a player; give a thumbs up if that player is good or a thumbs down if that player is evil.
villageidiot.name: Village Idiot
villageidiot.otherNightReminder: The Village Idiot points to a player; give a thumbs up if that player is good or a thumbs down if that player is evil.

virgin.ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.
virgin.name: Virgin

vizier.ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.
vizier.firstNightReminder: Announce 'The Vizier is in play' and state which player they are.
vizier.name: Vizier

vortox.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.
vortox.name: Vortox
vortox.otherNightReminder: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.

voudon.ability: Only you and the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority is not required.
voudon.name: Voudon

washerwoman.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
washerwoman.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
washerwoman.name: Washerwoman

widow.ability: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire and choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.
widow.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Widow for as long as they need. The Widow points to a player. That player is poisoned. Wake a good player. Show the 'These characters are in play' card, then the Widow character token.
widow.name: Widow

witch.ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.
witch.firstNightReminder: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
witch.name: Witch
witch.otherNightReminder: If there are 4 or more players alive: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.

yaggababble.ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
yaggababble.firstNightReminder: Show the Yaggababble their secret phrase.
yaggababble.name: Yaggababble
yaggababble.otherNightReminder: Choose a number of players up to the total number of times the Yaggababble said their secret phrase publicly, those players die.

zealot.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.
zealot.name: Zealot

zombuul.ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
zombuul.name: Zombuul
zombuul.otherNightReminder: If no-one died during the day: The Zombuul points to a player. That player dies.

jinx.reason: The Chambermaid learns if the Mathematician wakes tonight or not, even though the Chambermaid wakes first.
The Storyteller cannot gain the Evil Twin ability if the Plague Doctor dies.
If the Cannibal gains the Butler ability, the Cannibal learns this.
If the Juggler guesses on their first day and dies by execution, tonight the living Cannibal learns how many guesses the Juggler got correct.
If the Cannibal gains the Zealot ability, the Cannibal learns this.
The Mathematician learns if the Lunatic attacks a different player(s) than the real Demon attacked.
A Pit-Hag can not create a Heretic.
If a Pit-Hag creates a Damsel, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Politician, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
If there is a spare token, the Pit-Hag can create an extra Village Idiot. If so, the drunk Village Idiot might change.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Cult Leader, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Goon, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Ogre, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
The Cerenovus may choose to make a player mad that they are the Goblin.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Goblin ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
If Leviathan nominates and executes the Soldier, the Soldier does not die.
If Leviathan nominates and executes the player the Monk chose, that player does not die.
If Leviathan nominates and executes a player the Innkeeper chose, that player does not die.
If Leviathan is in play & the Ravenkeeper dies by execution, they wake that night to use their ability. They are drunk if their nominator was good.
If Leviathan is in play, and the Banshee dies by execution, all players learn that the Banshee has died, and the Banshee gains their ability.
If Leviathan is in play & the Sage dies by execution, they wake that night to use their ability. They are drunk if their nominator was good.
If Leviathan is in play & a Farmer dies by execution, a good player becomes a Farmer that night.
If Leviathan is in play & no execution occurs on day 5, good wins.
If the Hatter dies on or after day 5, the Demon cannot choose Leviathan.
After day 5, the Pit-Hag cannot choose Leviathan.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, Minions don't wake together. They are woken one by one, until one of them chooses to take the Lil' Monsta token.
Each night, the Magician chooses a Minion: if that Minion & Lil' Monsta are alive, that Minion babysits Lil’ Monsta.
If there are 5 or more players alive and the player holding the Lil' Monsta token dies, the Scarlet Woman is given the Lil' Monsta token tonight.
Votes for the Organ Grinder count if the Organ Grinder is babysitting Lil' Monsta.
The Vizier can die by execution if they are babysitting Lil' Monsta.
If a Demon chooses Lil' Monsta, they also choose a Minion to become and babysit Lil' Monsta tonight.
If the Lycanthrope is alive and the Gambler kills themself at night, no other players can die tonight.
Legion and the Engineer can not both be in play at the start of the game. If the Engineer creates Legion, most players (including all evil players) become evil Legion.
If the Preacher chooses Legion, Legion keeps their ability, but the Preacher might learn they are Legion.
If Legion died by execution today, Legion keeps their ability, but the Minstrel might learn they are Legion.
If the Hatter dies and Legion is in play, nothing happens. If the Hatter dies and an evil player chooses Legion, all current evil players become Legion.
The Zealot might register as evil to Legion's ability.
If the Fang Gu chooses an Outsider and dies, the Scarlet Woman does not become the Fang Gu.
The Alchemist can not have the Spy ability.
When the Spy sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician's character tokens are removed.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, the Spy does not see the Grimoire until the Poppy Grower dies.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Spy ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
If the Spy is (or has been) in play, the Damsel is poisoned.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
The Spy registers as evil to the Ogre.
The Alchemist can not have the Widow ability.
When the Widow sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician's character tokens are removed.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, the Widow does not see the Grimoire until the Poppy Grower dies.
If the Widow is (or has been) in play, the Damsel is poisoned.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Scarlet Woman ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
If the Plague Doctor is executed and the Storyteller would gain the Boomdandy ability, the Boomdandy ability triggers immediately.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Fearmonger ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
If the Exorcist chooses the Yaggababble, the Yaggababble ability does not kill tonight.
If the Summoner is in play, the Clockmaker does not receive their information until a Demon is created.

If there is an Alchemist-Summoner in play, the game starts with a Demon in play, as normal. If the Alchemist-Summoner chooses a player, they make that player a Demon but do not change their alignment.
If the Poppy Grower is alive when the Summoner acts, the Summoner chooses which Demon, but the Storyteller chooses which player.
The Marionette neighbors the Summoner. The Summoner knows who the Marionette is.
The Summoner cannot create an in-play Demon. If the Summoner creates a not-in-play Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
The Summoner cannot create an in-play Demon. If the Summoner creates a not-in-play Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Summoner is drunk on the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon, but the Storyteller chooses which player.
If the Engineer removes a Summoner from play before that Summoner uses their ability, the Summoner uses their ability immediately.
If the Summoner turns a dead player into the Zombuul, the Storyteller treats that player as a Zombuul that has died once.
The Summoner may choose a player to become the Pukka on the 2nd night.
If the Summoner creates Riot, all Minions also become Riot.
If the Summoner creates Legion, most players (including all evil players) become evil Legion.
The Summoner cannot create an in-play Demon. If the Summoner creates a not-in-play Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Preacher chose the Summoner on or before the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon, but the Storyteller chooses which player.
If the Summoner creates a Lord Of Typhon, the Lord Of Typhon must neighbor a Minion. The other neighbor becomes a not-in-play evil Minion.
The Baron might only add 1 Outsider, not 2.
If the Storyteller gains the Baron ability, up to two players become not-in-play Outsiders.
The Marionette neighbors a Minion, not the Demon. The Marionette is not woken to choose who takes the Lil' Monsta token, and does not learn they are the Marionette if they have the Lil' Monsta token.
When the Poppy Grower dies, the Demon learns the Marionette but the Marionette learns nothing.
The Marionette does not learn 3 not in-play characters. The Demon learns an extra 3 instead.
If the Marionette thinks that they are the Balloonist, +1 Outsider might have been added.
The Marionette does not learn that a Damsel is in play.

If the Demon has a neighbor who is alive and a Townsfolk or Outsider when the Plague Doctor dies, that player becomes an evil Marionette. If there is already an extra evil player, this does not happen.
If the Marionette thinks that they are the Huntsman, the Damsel was added.
If the Mastermind is alive and the Lleech's host dies by execution, the Lleech lives but loses their ability.
If the Slayer slays the Lleech's host, the host dies.
If the Lleech has poisoned the Heretic then the Lleech dies, the Heretic remains poisoned.
An evil Townsfolk is only created if the Bounty Hunter is still in play after the Kazali acts.
If the Kazali chooses the Goon to become a Minion, remaining Minion choices are decided by the Storyteller.
If the Kazali chooses to create a Marionette, they must choose one of their neighbors.
If the Kazali chooses the Damsel to become a Minion, and a Huntsman is in play, a good player becomes the Damsel.
The Kazali can not choose the King to become a Minion if a Choirboy is in play.
If the Kazali turns the Soldier into a Minion, the Soldier chooses which not-in-play Minion to become.
Riot and the Engineer can not both be in play at the start of the game. If the Engineer creates Riot, the evil players become Riot.
If the Golem nominates Riot, the Riot player does not die.
If the Snitch is in play, each Riot player gets an extra 3 bluffs.
If a good player nominates and kills the Saint, the Saint's team loses.
The Butler can not nominate their master.
If the Pit-Hag creates Riot, all evil players become Riot. If the Pit-Hag creates Riot after day 3, the game continues for one more day.
If the 3rd day begins with just three players alive, the players may choose (as a group) not to nominate at all. If so (and a Mayor is alive) then the Mayor's team wins.
If a Riot player nominates and kills the Monk-protected-player, the Monk-protected-player does not die.
If a Riot player nominates and kills a Farmer, the Farmer uses their ability tonight.
If a Riot player nominates an Innkeeper-protected-player, the Innkeeper-protected-player does not die.
If a Riot player nominates and kills a Sage, the Sage uses their ability tonight.
If Riot nominates and kills the Banshee, all players learn that the Banshee has died, and the Banshee may nominate two players immediately.
If a Riot player nominates and kills the Ravenkeeper, the Ravenkeeper uses their ability tonight.
If a Riot player nominates the Soldier, the Soldier does not die.
If a Riot player nominates and kills the Grandchild, the Grandmother dies too.
If a Riot player nominates and kills the King and the Choirboy is alive, the Choirboy uses their ability tonight.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Undertaker.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Cannibal.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Pacifist.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Devil's Advocate.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Investigator.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Clockmaker.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Town Crier.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Damsel.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Preacher.
If the Hatter dies, Riot is in play and a Riot chooses a different Demon, a normal evil team is created from the Riot players. If the Hatter dies and the Demon chooses Riot, Minions become Riot too.
If you are nominated, you must nominate again, even if dead.
If there are two living Al-Hadikhias, the Scarlet Woman Al-Hadikhia becomes the Scarlet Woman again.
If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Butler may raise their hand to vote but their vote is only counted if their master voted too.
If the Minstrel makes everyone drunk, the Organ Grinder keeps their ability but the Minstrel keeps their eyes open when voting.
If the Preacher removes the Organ Grinder ability, the Organ Grinder keeps their ability but the Preacher keeps their eyes open when voting.
If the Investigator learns that the Vizier is in play, the existence of the Vizier is not announced by the Storyteller.
If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this. If the Vizier is executed while they have their ability, their team wins.
If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this. If the Vizier is executed while they have their ability, their team wins.
If the Alchemist has the Vizier ability, they may only choose to execute immediately if three or more players voted, regardless of those players' alignment.
If the Vizier and Magician are both in play, the Demon does not learn the Minions.
The Vizier wakes with the Fearmonger, learns who they choose and cannot choose to immediately execute that player.
The Politician might register as evil to the Vizier.
If the Vizier is in play, the Alsaahir must also guess which Demon(s) are in play.
The Zealot might register as evil to the Vizier.
If the Vortox is in play and the Demon kills the Banshee, the players still learn that the Banshee has died.
If the Recluse registers as evil to the Ogre, the Ogre learns that they are evil.
If the Philosopher gains the Bounty Hunter ability, a Townsfolk might turn evil.
If the Al-Hadikhia dies by execution, and the Mastermind is alive, the Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 good players tonight: if all 3 choose to live, evil wins. Otherwise, good wins.

role_list.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
role_list.name: Washerwoman

role_list.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
role_list.name: Librarian

role_list.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
role_list.name: Investigator

role_list.ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.
role_list.name: Chef

role_list.ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.
role_list.name: Empath
role_list.otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil neighbours.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Demon.
role_list.name: Fortune Teller
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.

role_list.ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
role_list.name: Undertaker
role_list.otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today: Show that player’s character token.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
role_list.name: Monk
role_list.otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.

role_list.ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
role_list.name: Ravenkeeper
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight: The Ravenkeeper points to a player. Show that player’s character token.

role_list.ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.
role_list.name: Virgin

role_list.ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.
role_list.name: Slayer

role_list.ability: You are safe from the Demon.
role_list.name: Soldier

role_list.ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
role_list.name: Mayor

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
role_list.name: Butler
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.

role_list.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.
role_list.name: Drunk

role_list.ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.
role_list.name: Recluse

role_list.ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.
role_list.name: Saint

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
role_list.name: Poisoner
role_list.otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.

role_list.ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
role_list.name: Spy
role_list.otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.

role_list.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don’t count)
role_list.name: Scarlet Woman
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.

role_list.ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]
role_list.name: Baron

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
role_list.name: Imp
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Imp points to a player. That player dies. If the Imp chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Imp token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Imp token.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
role_list.name: Bureaucrat
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
role_list.name: Thief
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

role_list.ability: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.
role_list.name: Gunslinger

role_list.ability: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.
role_list.name: Scapegoat

role_list.ability: You must use a vote token to vote. Dead players may choose to give you theirs. If so, you learn their alignment. You are sober & healthy.
role_list.name: Beggar

role_list.ability: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the marked character token. Point to the marked player.
role_list.name: Grandmother
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Grandmother’s grandchild was killed by the Demon tonight: The Grandmother dies.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
role_list.name: Sailor
role_list.otherNightReminder: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
role_list.name: Chambermaid
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
role_list.name: Exorcist
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon. Show the Exorcist token. Point to the Exorcist. The Demon does not act tonight.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.
role_list.name: Innkeeper
role_list.otherNightReminder: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.
role_list.name: Gambler
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Gambler points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.

role_list.ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
role_list.name: Gossip
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Gossip’s public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
role_list.name: Courtier
role_list.otherNightReminder: Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is poisoned. If the Courtier has not yet used their ability: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.
role_list.name: Professor
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Professor has not used their ability: The Professor either shakes their head no, or points to a player. If that player is a Townsfolk, they are now alive.

role_list.ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.
role_list.name: Minstrel

role_list.ability: If both your alive neighbours are good, they can't die.
role_list.name: Tea Lady

role_list.ability: Executed good players might not die.
role_list.name: Pacifist

role_list.ability: The first time you die, you don't.
role_list.name: Fool

role_list.ability: You might die at any time.
role_list.name: Tinker
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Tinker might die.

role_list.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.
role_list.name: Moonchild
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Moonchild used their ability to target a player today: If that player is good, they die.

role_list.ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.
role_list.name: Goon

role_list.ability: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.
role_list.firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: Show the Lunatic a number of arbitrary 'Minions', players equal to the number of Minions in play. Show 3 character tokens of arbitrary good characters. If the token received by the Lunatic is a Demon that would wake tonight: Allow the Lunatic to do the Demon actions. Place their 'attack' markers. Wake the Demon. Show the Demon’s real character token. Show them the Lunatic player. If the Lunatic attacked players: Show the real demon each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.
role_list.name: Lunatic
role_list.otherNightReminder: Allow the Lunatic to do the actions of the Demon. Place their 'attack' markers. If the Lunatic selected players: Wake the Demon. Show the 'attack' marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.

role_list.ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [−1 or +1 Outsider]
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.
role_list.name: Godfather
role_list.otherNightReminder: If an Outsider died today: The Godfather points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
role_list.name: Devil's Advocate
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.
role_list.name: Assassin
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Assassin has not yet used their ability: The Assassin either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.
role_list.name: Mastermind

role_list.ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
role_list.name: Zombuul
role_list.otherNightReminder: If no-one died during the day: The Zombuul points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned.
role_list.name: Pukka
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
role_list.name: Shabaloth
role_list.otherNightReminder: One player that the Shabaloth chose the previous night might be resurrected. The Shabaloth points to two players. Those players die.

role_list.ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.
role_list.name: Po
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Po chose no-one the previous night: The Po points to three players. Otherwise: The Po either shows the 'no' head signal , or points to a player. Chosen players die

role_list.ability: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Apprentice the 'You are' card, then a Townsfolk or Minion token. In the Grimoire, replace the Apprentice token with that character token, and put the Apprentice's 'Is the Apprentice' reminder by that character token.
role_list.name: Apprentice

role_list.ability: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.
role_list.name: Matron

role_list.ability: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.
role_list.name: Judge

role_list.ability: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposite player must be nominated each day.
role_list.name: Bishop

role_list.ability: Only you and the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority is not required.
role_list.name: Voudon

role_list.ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (1, 2, 3, etc.) of places from Demon to closest Minion.
role_list.name: Clockmaker

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
role_list.name: Dreamer
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
role_list.name: Snake Charmer
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.

role_list.ability: Each night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
role_list.name: Mathematician
role_list.otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.

role_list.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.
role_list.name: Flowergirl
role_list.otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether the Demon voted today. Place the 'Demon not voted' marker (remove 'Demon voted', if any).

role_list.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.
role_list.name: Town Crier
role_list.otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Minion nominated today. Place the 'Minion not nominated' marker (remove 'Minion nominated', if any).

role_list.ability: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.
role_list.name: Oracle
role_list.otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of dead evil players.

role_list.ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.
role_list.name: Savant

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
role_list.name: Seamstress
