role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Seamstress has not yet used their ability: the Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.
role_list.name: Philosopher
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Philosopher has not used their ability: the Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.

role_list.ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.
role_list.name: Artist

role_list.ability: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.
role_list.name: Juggler
role_list.otherNightReminder: If today was the Juggler’s first day: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of 'Correct' markers. Remove markers.

role_list.ability: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
role_list.name: Sage
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Sage was killed by a Demon: Point to two players, one of which is that Demon.

role_list.ability: If you are “mad” about being an Outsider, you might be executed.
role_list.name: Mutant

role_list.ability: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.
role_list.name: Sweetheart
role_list.otherNightReminder: Choose a player that is drunk.

role_list.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
role_list.name: Barber
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Barber died today: Wake the Demon. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players. If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show 'You are', then their new character token.

role_list.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.
role_list.name: Klutz

role_list.ability: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake the Evil Twin and their twin. Confirm that they have acknowledged each other. Point to the Evil Twin. Show their Evil Twin token to the twin player. Point to the twin. Show their character token to the Evil Twin player.
role_list.name: Evil Twin

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
role_list.name: Witch
role_list.otherNightReminder: If there are 4 or more players alive: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are “mad” they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
role_list.name: Cerenovus
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
role_list.name: Pit-Hag
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Pit-Hag points to a player and a character on the sheet. If this character is not in play, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character token. If the character is in play, nothing happens.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
role_list.name: Fang Gu
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was an Outsider and there are no other Fang Gu in play: The Fang Gu dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Fang Gu. Wake the new Fang Gu. Show the 'You are' card, then the Fang Gu token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [−1 Outsider]
role_list.name: Vigormortis
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Vigormortis points to a player. That player dies. If a Minion, they keep their ability and one of their Townsfolk neighbours is poisoned.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.
role_list.name: No Dashii
role_list.otherNightReminder: The No Dashii points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.
role_list.name: Vortox
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy and gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
role_list.name: Barista
role_list.otherNightReminder: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.
role_list.name: Harlot
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Harlot points at any player. Then, put the Harlot to sleep. Wake the chosen player, show them the 'This character selected you' token, then the Harlot token. That player either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nodded their head yes, wake the Harlot and show them the chosen player's character token. Then, you may decide that both players die.

role_list.ability: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.
role_list.name: Butcher

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.
role_list.name: Bone Collector
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Bone Collector either shakes their head no or points at any dead player. If they pointed at any dead player, put the Bone Collector's 'Has Ability' reminder by the chosen player's character token. (They may need to be woken tonight to use it.)

role_list.ability: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.
role_list.name: Deviant

role_list.ability: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Point to 3 players including one evil player, in no particular order.
role_list.name: Noble

role_list.ability: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
role_list.firstNightReminder: Point to 1 evil player. Wake the townsfolk who is evil and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
role_list.name: Bounty Hunter
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the known evil player has died, point to another evil player.

role_list.ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Pixie 1 in-play Townsfolk character token.
role_list.name: Pixie

role_list.ability: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.
role_list.name: General
role_list.otherNightReminder: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
role_list.name: Preacher
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.

role_list.ability: Each night, if the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon, show them the 'This character selected you' card, show the King token and point to the King player.
role_list.name: King
role_list.otherNightReminder: If there are more dead than living, show the King a character token of a living player.

role_list.ability: Each night, you learn 1 player of each character type, until there are no more types to learn. [+1 Outsider]
role_list.firstNightReminder: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
role_list.name: Balloonist
role_list.otherNightReminder: Choose a character type that does not yet have a Seen reminder next to a character of that type. Point to a player whose character is of that type, if there are any. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.

role_list.ability: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbour. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.
role_list.firstNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
role_list.name: Cult Leader
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if good, they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.
role_list.name: Lycanthrope
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Lycanthrope points to a living player: if good, they die and no one else can die tonight.

role_list.ability: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Decide the Amnesiac's entire ability. If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
role_list.name: Amnesiac
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.
role_list.name: Nightwatchman
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the You are card and the relevant character tokens.
role_list.name: Engineer
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character tokens.

role_list.ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help you win.
role_list.name: Fisherman

role_list.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.
role_list.name: Huntsman
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.

role_list.ability: You have a not-in-play Minion ability.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Alchemist a not-in-play Minion token
role_list.name: Alchemist

role_list.ability: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.
role_list.name: Farmer
role_list.otherNightReminder: If a Farmer died tonight, choose another good player and make them the Farmer. Wake this player, show them the 'You are' card and the Farmer character token.

role_list.ability: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.
role_list.name: Magician

role_list.ability: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+ the King]
role_list.name: Choirboy
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the King was killed by the Demon, wake the Choirboy and point to the Demon player.

role_list.ability: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Do not inform the Demon/Minions who each other are
role_list.name: Poppy Grower
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Poppy Grower has died, show the Minions/Demon who each other are.

role_list.ability: The Storyteller can break the game rules & if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]
role_list.name: Atheist

role_list.ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
role_list.name: Cannibal

role_list.ability: Minions start knowing 3 not-in-play characters.
role_list.firstNightReminder: After Minion info wake each Minion and show them three not-in-play character tokens. These may be the same or different to each other and the ones shown to the Demon.
role_list.name: Snitch

role_list.ability: Each night*, if either good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, you die.
role_list.name: Acrobat
role_list.otherNightReminder: If a good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, the Acrobat player dies.

role_list.ability: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.
role_list.name: Puzzlemaster

role_list.ability: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.
role_list.name: Heretic

role_list.ability: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake all the Minions, show them the 'This character selected you' card and the Damsel token.
role_list.name: Damsel
role_list.otherNightReminder: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show 'You are' card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

role_list.ability: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.
role_list.name: Golem

role_list.ability: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.
role_list.name: Politician

role_list.ability: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire and choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Widow for as long as they need. The Widow points to a player. That player is poisoned. Wake a good player. Show the 'These characters are in play' card, then the Widow character token.
role_list.name: Widow

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player. If you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Fearmonger points to a player. Place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.
role_list.name: Fearmonger
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Fearmonger points to a player. If different from the previous night, place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.

role_list.ability: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.
role_list.name: Psychopath

role_list.ability: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.
role_list.name: Goblin

role_list.ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Mephit their secret word.
role_list.name: Mephit
role_list.otherNightReminder: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mephit's secret word and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil signal.

role_list.ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Mezepheles their secret word.
role_list.name: Mezepheles
role_list.otherNightReminder: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mezepheles' secret word and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil signal.

role_list.ability: You think you are a good character but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbour the Demon]
role_list.firstNightReminder: Select one of the good players next to the Demon and place the Is the Marionette reminder token. Wake the Demon and show them the Marionette.
role_list.name: Marionette

role_list.ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.
role_list.name: Boomdandy

role_list.ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". A player dies each night*. [+1 Minion]
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
role_list.name: Lil' Monsta
role_list.otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing an alive player: they are poisoned - you die if & only if they die.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Lleech points to a player. Place the Poisoned reminder token.
role_list.name: Lleech
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Lleech points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
role_list.name: Al-Hadikhia
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 players. Announce the first player, wake them to nod yes to live or shake head no to die, kill or resurrect accordingly, then put to sleep and announce the next player. If all 3 are alive after this, all 3 die.

role_list.ability: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]
role_list.name: Legion
role_list.otherNightReminder: Choose a player, that player dies.

role_list.ability: If more than 1 good player is executed, you win. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Place the Leviathan 'Day 1' marker. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play; this is Day 1.'
role_list.name: Leviathan
role_list.otherNightReminder: Change the Leviathan Day reminder for the next day.

role_list.ability: Nominees die, but may nominate again immediately (on day 3, they must). After day 3, evil wins. [All Minions are Riot]
role_list.name: Riot

role_list.ability: Once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbour, if your other alive neighbour agrees.
role_list.name: Gangster

role_list.ability: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.
role_list.name: Doomsayer

role_list.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.
role_list.name: Angel

role_list.ability: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.
role_list.name: Buddhist

role_list.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.
role_list.name: Hell's Librarian

role_list.ability: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, one of them registers falsely.
role_list.name: Revolutionary

role_list.ability: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.
role_list.name: Fiddler

role_list.ability: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.
role_list.name: Toymaker
role_list.otherNightReminder: If it is a night when a Demon attack could end the game, and the Demon is marked “Final night: No Attack,” then the Demon does not act tonight. (Do not wake them.)

role_list.ability: Once per game, 1 good player might get false information.
role_list.name: Fibbin

role_list.ability: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.
role_list.name: Duchess
role_list.otherNightReminder: Wake each player marked “Visitor” or “False Info” one at a time. Show them the Duchess token, then fingers (1, 2, 3) equaling the number of evil players marked “Visitor” or, if you are waking the player marked “False Info,” show them any number of fingers except the number of evil players marked “Visitor.”

role_list.ability: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.
role_list.name: Sentinel

role_list.ability: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.
role_list.name: Spirit of Ivory

role_list.ability: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.
role_list.name: Djinn

role_list.ability: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Mark a good player as "Safe". Wake each evil player and show them the marked player.
role_list.name: Storm Catcher

role_list.firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: wake up all of the Minions. They make eye contact with each other. Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Point to the Demon.
role_list.name: Minion Info

role_list.firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: wake up the Demon. Show the 'These are your minions' card. Point to each Minion. Show the 'These characters are not in play' card. Show 3 character tokens of Good characters that are not in play
role_list.name: Demon Info

role_list.firstNightReminder: Check that all eyes are closed. Some travellers act.
role_list.name: Dusk
role_list.otherNightReminder: Check that all eyes are closed. Some travellers act.

role_list.firstNightReminder: Wait approximately 10 seconds. Call for eyes open, then immediately announce which players (if any) died.
role_list.name: Dawn
role_list.otherNightReminder: Wait approximately 10 seconds. Call for eyes open, then immediately announce which players (if any) died.

role_list.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.
role_list.name: Zealot

role_list.ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.
role_list.name: Alsaahir

role_list.ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Point to a player.
role_list.name: High Priestess
role_list.otherNightReminder: Point to a player.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? To +? Outsiders]
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake the players on either side of the Demon. Show them the 'You Are' card, the token of the Minion they now are, and a thumbs down to indicate they are evil.
role_list.name: Lord of Typhon
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Lord of Typhon points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.
role_list.name: Organ Grinder

role_list.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or both might die.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake the Harpy; they point at one player, then another. Wake the 1st player the Harpy pointed to, show them the 'This character has selected you' card, show them the Harpy token, then point at the 2nd player the Harpy pointed to.
role_list.name: Harpy
role_list.otherNightReminder: Wake the Harpy; they point at one player, then another. Wake the 1st player the Harpy pointed to, show them the 'This character has selected you' card, show them the Harpy token, then point at the 2nd player the Harpy pointed to.

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
role_list.name: Ojo
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Ojo points to a character on the sheet; if in play, that player dies. If it is not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies instead.

role_list.ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.
role_list.name: Banshee
role_list.otherNightReminder: Announce that the Banshee has died.

role_list.ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Village Idiot points to a player; give a thumbs up if that player is good or a thumbs down if that player is evil.
role_list.name: Village Idiot
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Village Idiot points to a player; give a thumbs up if that player is good or a thumbs down if that player is evil.

role_list.ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Ogre points to a player (not themselves) and becomes their alignment.
role_list.name: Ogre

role_list.ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.
role_list.name: Plague Doctor

role_list.ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the 'These characters are not in play' card. Show 3 character tokens of good characters not in play.
role_list.name: Summoner
role_list.otherNightReminder: If it is the 3rd night, wake the Summoner. They point to a player and a Demon on the character sheet - that player becomes that Demon.

role_list.ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake the Shugenja; point horizontally in the direction of the closest evil player. If the two closest evil players are equidistant, point your finger horizontally in either direction.
role_list.name: Shugenja

role_list.ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Point to two players who are not the Demon.
role_list.name: Knight

role_list.ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Announce 'The Vizier is in play' and state which player they are.
role_list.name: Vizier

role_list.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]
role_list.firstNightReminder: The Kazali points at a player and a Minion on the character sheet. Replace their old character token with the Minion token, show them the “You Are” info token then the Minion character token, and give a thumbs down. Repeat until the normal number of Minions exist. Put the Kazali to sleep.
role_list.name: Kazali
role_list.otherNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player. That player dies.

role_list.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.
role_list.name: Hatter
role_list.otherNightReminder: If the Hatter died today: Wake the Minions and Demon. Show them the 'This Character Selected You' info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character.  If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Change each player to the character they chose.

role_list.ability: You start knowing 1 good player.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Point to a good player.
role_list.name: Steward

role_list.ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Show the Yaggababble their secret phrase.
role_list.name: Yaggababble
role_list.otherNightReminder: Choose a number of players up to the total number of times the Yaggababble said their secret phrase publicly, those players die.

role_list.ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character’s ability.  You both now which.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Wake the Boffin and how them the token of the ability the Demon has. Put the Boffin back to sleep. Wake the Demon, show the Boffin token, then show the token of the good ability the Demon has.
role_list.name: Boffin

role_list.ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
role_list.firstNightReminder: Announce the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
role_list.name: Bootlegger
